attributes.action: Keep the Anglo-Saxon Treasure in the West Midlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Support the call for the Anglo Saxon treasure to stay in the West Midlands.
The collection of 1,500 gold and silver pieces was found on a Staffordshire farm by a man using a metal detector.
The exhibition would be accessible to all of Britain, not just London, if it stayed in the West Midlands.
And an exhibition of this importance would bring in tourists from around the world to the West Midlands bringing new job opportunities.
Help us to keep our treasure where it belongs - in the West Midlands.
